caption.title:
Dependence of ESS G on recovery rate α with β
G < β
L .
caption.p:
For all lines, fixed parameters are x
C = 0.5, β
G = 8, β
L = 10. The red line denotes the evolutionarily stable (ESS) proportion of global infection G for p
CC = 0.2, the black line denotes that for p
CC = 0.25 the green line denotes that for p
CC = 0.3, and the blue line denotes that for p
CC = 0.33.
